metadata.title: Ice Conditions in the Eastern Bering Sea from NOAA and LANDSAT Imagery: Winter Conditions 1974, 1976, 1977, 1979

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: To show the history of ice conditions in the eastern Bering Sea from NOAA and LANDSAT imagery for winter 1974, 1976, 1977, and 1979.
metadata.notes:
